promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong lizard water-type pokemon with ancient scales. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Riversaur, a a massive strong lizard water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Aqua Slash. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "water" or "Riversaur". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, lizard-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Bound to aquatic habitats, Riversaur slices ripples with Aqua Slash and camouflages seamlessly. It dozes off to flowing currents.
